duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure a positive shopping experience for customers by greeting and assisting them in a courteous and helpful manner.
Maintain a clean and organized work area and ensure proper merchandise presentation.
Handle customer issues with a courteous and helpful approach, escalating to Store Leadership when necessary.
Perform cleaning tasks, restocking, and recovery to maintain a well-maintained and organized store.
Understand and follow company policies and procedures regarding sales, cash handling, and merchandise management.
Demonstrate a sense of urgency and efficiency in fulfilling job responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent qualification
